item.title: Fri 30 Dec 2022: 1990s Dutch party scene
item.description: DETAILS: 30 December 2022 8.30 PM UK time / 9.30 PM CET/WAT Duration: 104 mins Watch party: Provo.lol on Twitch Final tape session of the year is upon us! We’ll be viewing a 1990s Dutch countercultural classic ⭐️ 5.6/10 stars on IMDB so you know it’ll be a party bring friends, strangers, acquaintances, whoever :3
